
#include <iostream>
#include <algorithm>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
	
	int T; cin >> T;
	while(T--)
	{
		int N,tmp = 0, c = 0; cin >> N;
		int arr[N];
		
		//There are 2^n-1 subsequence and the largest value is the max element in the array	
		
		for(int i = 0; i < N; i++)
			cin >> arr[i];
			
		cout << (*max_element(arr,arr+N)) << endl;
	}
	
	return 0;
}
